title: Engineering (Science - PCM)
description: Path to becoming an Engineer, Architect, or Scientist.

steps.title: Class 10
steps.detail: Focus on Mathematics and Science basics.

steps.title: Class 11-12 (PCM)
steps.detail: Choose Physics, Chemistry, Maths. Prepare for competitive exams.

steps.title: Entrance Exams
steps.detail: Appear for JEE Main, JEE Advanced, BITSAT, etc.

steps.title: Undergraduate Degree
steps.detail: B.Tech / B.E. (4 Years) in chosen specialization.

steps.title: Internships
steps.detail: Gain practical experience during college.

steps.title: Job / Higher Studies
steps.detail: Campus Placements or GATE/GRE for M.Tech/MS.

title: Medical (Science - PCB)
description: Path to becoming a Doctor, Dentist, or Biologist.

steps.title: Class 10
steps.detail: Strong foundation in Biology.

steps.title: Class 11-12 (PCB)
steps.detail: Choose Physics, Chemistry, Biology.

steps.title: Entrance Exams
steps.detail: Appear for NEET (National Eligibility cum Entrance Test).

steps.title: MBBS / BDS
steps.detail: 5.5 Years degree including internship.

steps.title: Post Graduation
steps.detail: MD / MS for specialization (3 Years).

steps.title: Practice
steps.detail: Start private practice or join a hospital.

title: Commerce & Finance
description: Path to CA, CS, Banking, and Finance roles.

steps.title: Class 11-12 (Commerce)
steps.detail: Focus on Accountancy, Economics, Business Studies.

steps.title: Undergraduate
steps.detail: B.Com, BBA, or Professional Course (CA/CS/CMA).

steps.title: Professional Exams
steps.detail: Clear CA/CS Foundation, Inter, and Final exams.

steps.title: Articleship/Internship
steps.detail: Mandatory practical training.

steps.title: Certification
steps.detail: Obtain membership from ICAI/ICSI.

title: Humanities, Arts & Design
description: Path to Design, Civil Services, Law, and Media.

steps.title: Class 11-12 (Arts/Humanities)
steps.detail: Focus on History, Pol. Science, Sociology, English.

steps.title: Entrance Exams
steps.detail: CUET (for BA), NID/NIFT (for Design), CLAT (for Law).

steps.title: Undergraduate Degree
steps.detail: BA, B.Des, LLB, or BJMC.

steps.title: Skill Building
steps.detail: Internships, Portfolio building (for design), Moot courts (for law).

steps.title: Career Entry
steps.detail: Join firms, media houses, or clear UPSC for Civil Services.
